thread.title: Three killed as truck crashes into Cape Town house
thread.title_full: Three killed as truck crashes into Cape Town house | News24

author: news24.com
title: Three killed as truck crashes into Cape Town house
text:
Johannesburg - Three men died when a dump truck crashed into a house on Avenue St Denis in the upmarket Cape Town suburb of Fresnaye on Tuesday afternoon, paramedics said.
"ER24 paramedics arrived on the scene shortly after 15:00 and found a large dump truck wedged in a garage of a residence," ER24 spokesperson Russel Meiring said.
"On further assessment, paramedics found three lifeless bodies lying inside the front cab of the truck. All three men had succumbed to their multiple fatal injuries."
City rescue services arrived on the scene with specialised equipment to remove the truck and the bodies.
